title: Fix issue #4: Crash when typing stop name.
message:
Fix issue #4: Crash when typing stop name.

It appears the problem was happening because my CursorLoader implementation
was not complete & correct.  After several attempts at fixing it, I gave
up and went back to using a SimpleCursorAdapter.  This has the side benefit
of not requiring the Android support library, reducing the app size by over
100 kB.
